name: Castle in the park
description:
DESCRIPTION
Stunning private castle located on the edge of the chabrieres forest in the heart of France. The castle can accommodate 21 guests across 11 luxury ensuite bedrooms, each room has been individually designed and all have beautiful views over the surrounding parkland. The castle has been stylishly furnished combining vintage and contemporary styles using beautiful fabrics and ornate pieces collected from all over the world. The living area has a large lounge with french doors opening to the grounds, dining room, cinema room with vintage 1930s cinema chairs, small gym and a welcoming large dining kitchen and utility room offering all modern comforts whilst retaining exquisite style.
There is an abundance of interior and exterior space for 21 to 160 guests with beautiful decorated rooms with many options for cocktails and dining the opportunities are endless for your wedding day!
Our beautiful courtyard with its magnificent pavilion is perfect for a welcome or pre dinner cocktails with the castle as your backdrop. The pavilion can seat 100 guests, perfect for summer parties. The space easily transforms from an event space to the perfect chill out zone with hanging chairs and large bean bags perfect for unwinding with friends and family.
If you are looking for something more rustic our stunning 17th century barn with seating for 160 guests with space for band/DJ and dance floor as well as a separate area for catering and outdoor seating. Dine alfresco in the grounds next to the oldest oak tree in Aquitaine - it’s over 1000 years old surrounded by glittery fairy lights overlooking one of our 2 fresh water lakes a truly magical experience.
Covered Pergola seats 21 for intimate family dining, drinks and relaxing which can be used throughout the weekend.
We have a family friendly heated pool as well as rowing boats and swimming in the largest of our 2 fresh water lakes. Mountain bikes are available on request allowing you to explore the grounds following the path of the old Roman road getting up close and personal to the many wildlife living peacefully within our secure park. Table tennis, pool table, air hockey, table football and badminton are also available in our games room . Golf, riding and tennis courts are within easy reach of the castle.
The castle is the perfect combination of the privacy of your own personal castle with all the luxury and convenience of a hotel. Please do get in touch with us for more information.
